text: Mme ya re mo mosong o o latelang, morago ga ba kgabaganya lecha, bontsintsi jwa batho jwa simolola go phuthaganela mo lotshitshing (bo emetse go bona Jesu). Gonne ba ne ba itse gore barutwa ba ne ba tsamaile ka mokoro wa bone ba mo tlogela kwa morago. Mekoro e mennye e le mentsinyana e e tswang kwa Tiberia e ne e le gautshwane,
